title: LoL Launcher/PVP.net Cilent Volume level
body: I'm not sure if its just me but after the patch i booted up league and the launch button was SUPER loud (Like always because the volume goes back up to max after  every patch because yes) so i lowered it and lowered the login screen before i  got an earful of YORICK REWORK, like i always do but this time after launching it again today it both the launcher and client were on 1 and it was still super loud. i was thinking it was my audio settings but its only league that does this.

replies.body: Your client specifically may need a volume reduction.  Select your sound icon on the bottom right of your desktop and select volume mixer.  There should be a bar specifically for the client (while it's open), where you'll be able to tone that down.  Hope that helps!
Ah that was the issue, how stupid of me, thank you for the fix lol
